g.text: The epitaxial GMO thin film has an overall unit cell volume constrain of ~0.7%, in comparison to the respective
cell parameters of the bulk GMO (
. Moreover, the cell parameters of the
tetragonal film phase undergo a remarkable alteration analog to an expansion of ~2.8% in
contracts ~3.2%. Such significant values should be considered beyond a mere distortion of the orthorhombic phase.
